name.value: The status of a Concern associated with a condition

display.value: This is the status of the Concern related to the Condition

description.value: This communicates the status of the Concern associated with a condition. Values can be Active/Inactive/Resolved.

short.value: The status of a Concern associated with a condition

formal.value: This communicates the status of the Concern associated with a condition. Values can be Active/Inactive/Resolved.
